name: Farm Under Fire
description:
Farm Under Fire is an online multiplayer 3rd person shooter, with an old-school vibe, heavy metal music, and devilish fun!
Play online with friends, family or strangers and compete in a variety of different modes including Team Deathmatch and Free-For-All!
Pick up your weapon of choice and begin wreaking havoc with the help of various powerups available to pick up during the match!
You can jump into the battle with Tomato Launcher to deal damage to surrounding players, or hide in the bush with the Carrot Rifle, like a world class sniper!
Every weapon has its unique properties, and it's up to you do discover what's the best tool of destruction for you.
Multiple powerups can help you to get through the game with extra damage, shield, double jump or super speed and make you a much more intimidating competitor, a little piggy that no one wants to mess with!

The Devil has come down to Earth and has started FARMING! He possessed the pigs, and now they wreak havoc all across the globe!
It's time to put the farm under FIRE!
